extendedInfo.detail: Rice, pasta, herbs and seasonings.  Per Serving: 190 calories; 0 g sat fat (0% DV); 720 mg sodium (31% DV); less than 1 g total sugars.  EST 1958. Making home made easy. The San Francisco treat. Package contains empty space to accommodate grain to seasoning ratio. This package is sold by weight, not by volume. Contents may settle during shipping and handling. SmartLabel: Scan for more food information. 1-800-421-2444 Call for more food information.  We're here to help. ricearoni.com or 800-421-2444. Please have package available when calling. Find more ideas at ricearoni.com/recipes.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Rice, Wheat Flour, Salt, Monosodium Glutamate, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Torula Yeast, Onions, Natural Flavor (Contains Dairy And Soy), Chicken Broth, Chicken Fat, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Chicken, Turmeric (Color), Spices, Garlic, Disodium Guanylate, Disodium Inosinate, Chives (Dried), Ferric Orthophosphate, Niacinamide, Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Folic Acid, Riboflavin.
extendedInfo.directions: Microwave Directions: In 2-quart microwaveable bowl, combine rice-pasta mix and 2 tablespoons of butter or margarine. Microwave uncovered at high 1 minute. Stir. Microwave at high 1.2 more minutes or until pasta is golden brown. Remove and stir in 2-2/3 ) cups water and special seasonings. Microwave uncovered at high 19-12 minutes or until rice is tender. Let stand 3 minutes before serving. Microwave ovens vary: adjust times as needed. Preferred Method: Rice range top directions: what you need 2 tablespoons butter or margarine. 2 cups water. (1) In a large skillet, combine rice-pasta mix and butter or margarine. Saute over medium heat until pasta is golden brown, stirring frequently. (2) Slowly stir in water and special seasonings: Bring to a boil. (3) Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer 17 to 22 minutes or until rice is tender.  Make it a Meal: Easy as 1-2-3: (1) Stir in chopped red and green bell pepper during last 5 minutes of simmering. (2) Add cooked chicken breast, sliced into pieces. (3) Top with slivered almonds before serving (optional). Less Fat Directions: Follow range top or microwave directions, except replace butter with 1/2 tablespoon olive oil. When prepared using less fat directions: Fat reduced to 2.5 g from 7 g per serving. Saturated fat reduced to 0 g from 1.5 g per serving. Trans fat reduced to 0 g from 1 g per serving. See nutrition facts panel for sodium content.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains milk, soy and wheat Ingredients.
